title: Weird visuals and Steam is gone?
body: Just used the hextech tool kit, did a complete uninstall and reinstall.  That got rid of my laggy gameplay and FPS drop.  However, I now see large black boxes around spell effects, and it uninstalled Steam from my laptop.  W...T...F...

replies.body:
It sounds like Steam and League were installed into the same directory. Whenever you run the Hextech Repair Tool for a reinstall, it will uninstall everything that is in League's default install directory. When you ran the tool to reinstall League, since Steam was in the same location it was uninstalled as well.

We can still get to the bottom of the weird black boxes around spell effects. This can happen if the game files for that spell is corrupted in any way. Your best bet is to try and run the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) again with the force repatch option selected. This way you won't be uninstalling anything, but the toll will still be able to go through and repair any damaged files.
Bump again since they pick and chose what they respond to.  If it's not a copy paste fix, do they not respond?
